snippet: World number two Andy Murray says Maria Sharapova should be banned after her positive test for meldonium and questioned the Russian's use of the drug for medical purposes....
lead_paragraph: World number two Andy Murray says Maria Sharapova should be banned after her positive test for meldonium and questioned the Russian's use of the drug for medical purposes.

headline.print_headline: Forthright Murray Says Sharapova Should Be Banned
headline.main: Forthright Murray Says Sharapova Should Be Banned
